scripts.build: npx tsc && npx rimraf node_modules && npm install --only=production && cp -R node_modules .build/
scripts.sam:prepare: npm run build && sam package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file packaged.yml --s3-bucket serverlessapplication-artifacts-o9oluwjniatl
scripts.sam:publish: npm run sam:prepare && sam publish --template packaged.yml --region eu-central-1 && rm packaged.yml
